quotationCreate.title: Create Quotation
quotationCreate.noProjectSelected: Please select a project to create a quotation.

quotationEdit.title: Edit Quotation

quotationDetail.title: Quotation Details
quotationDetail.pendingApprovalDescription: Approval workflow has been initiated. Please wait for approval processing.

confirmSubmit.title: Submit for Approval
confirmSubmit.message: Are you sure you want to submit "{{jobCode}}" for approval? This will start the approval workflow.

confirmVersion.title: Create New Version
confirmVersion.message: Create a new version based on "{{jobCode}} v{{version}}"? The new version will be in DRAFT status.

confirmAccept.title: Accept Quotation
confirmAccept.message: Mark "{{jobCode}} v{{version}}" as accepted by customer? This will activate the associated project.

invoiceSelectProject.title: Create Invoice
invoiceSelectProject.description: Select a project to create an invoice for
invoiceSelectProject.selectProjectDescription: Choose a project with an accepted quotation to create an invoice.
invoiceSelectProject.noProjectsDescription: There are no projects available for invoicing. Projects must be in progress or completed.

invoiceCreate.title: Create Invoice
invoiceCreate.description: Create a new tax invoice for this project

noAcceptedQuotation.title: No Accepted Quotation
noAcceptedQuotation.description: This project does not have an accepted quotation. A quotation must be accepted by the customer before creating invoices.

allItemsInvoiced.title: All Items Invoiced
allItemsInvoiced.description: All delivered items have been invoiced. No remaining items to invoice.

lineItems.title: Line Items
lineItems.description: Enter the quantity to invoice for each item. Only items with delivered quantity are shown.

errors.noItems: Please enter quantity for at least one item
errors.invalidDueDate: Due date must be on or after issue date

companyCreate.title: Create New Company
companyCreate.description: Add a new company with customer, vendor, or outsource roles

companyEdit.cannotEditInactive: This company cannot be edited because it is inactive.
companyEdit.currentRoles: Current roles assigned to this company:
companyEdit.cannotRemoveLastRole: Cannot remove the last role. A company must have at least one role.
companyEdit.allRolesAssigned: This company has all available roles assigned.
